name: royalty cowl
notes:
**this is unique ribbed cowl design that includes a fun edging that uses bobbles and picots to create the points. . **

> use code **get1off** at checkout or use the code **20off3** when you add 3 or more patterns to your cart.

**size**: adult one size

**skill level**: easy (skills and techniques used include - working in the round, working in rows, working in the third loop, following instructions for 2 special stitches)

**yarn**: #3 dk weight 1 skein (220 yards) martinâ€™s lab comfy dk in poltergeist or suitable substitute

**hook size**: us size (h/8) 5.0 mm or size needed to obtain gauge

**other**: read through all of the pattern notes before beginning and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns.
